xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: The Board Meeting today commenced at 4.30 p.m. and consideration of financial results for the quarter and Year ended 31 March 2024, was approved at 5.15 p.m. Full financial results have been filed with stock exchanges. Detailed notes forms part of financial results.
